mil3.6.9:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.6.9:0.3_0: one should stay apart from pride.
mil3.6.9:1.3_0: “Great king, take a person who dies here and dies here. And since they die there’s nothing but die, great king, and dies.”
mil3.6.9:1.5_0: “Great king, suppose a person were to put away a mango tree ... bone such a tree ...
mil3.6.9:1.6_0: In the same way, here a person here dies here and there is a deadly give rise to it, except if the king dies, it’s dead, and if it’s dead, he becomes killed..”
